topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55272b3c6368725b0dca0500#post_55272b3c6368725b0dca0500
Nah; tumblr isn't going to get shut down.  When you get down to it most of the current most popular websites became popular through shear luck; what will eventually happen to tumblr, youtube, facebook and other of the most popular websites is that someone will come out with a better product or a product that successfully integrates the functionality of them into one site and thus they will become the most popular sites.
